title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 1100-13.1 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 1100-13.1 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or its application to any
person or circumstance is determined to be contrary to law by a court of
competent jurisdiction, such determination does not affect or impair the
validity of the other provisions of this Part or the application to other
persons and circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
1100-13.1

Transferred from 900-13.1

New

York State Register July 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 29, eff. 6/26/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
